text:
Weaviate Academy Unit 1: Query Examples (Part 2) 
hi good to see you again in this section we'll continue to take a look at vectors in action by showing you more examples of real queries in weaviate in an earlier video we talked about making information dynamic now we'll take a look at additional examples of exactly that we'll show you how you can use waviate to not only retrieve an object but to extract the specific relevant part of the question then we'll also take a look at generative search or aviate retrieves search results and then transforms it based on a set of instructions before delivering them to us these tools can transform how you interact with your data and make use of the information to bring them to life I think you'll find these very interesting and really get you excited for some Hands-On sections that we'll move on to next okay then we'll see you soon
